code: @Test public void testHystrix() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Fallback message").     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedPropertyReceived(HystrixConstants.HYSTRIX_RESPONSE_SUCCESSFUL_EXECUTION, false).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedPropertyReceived(HystrixConstants.HYSTRIX_RESPONSE_FROM_FALLBACK, true).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
